DOC.brief_summary: It is a study to assess the tolerance to a new commercially available infant formula in children affected by Cow`s Milk Allergy.
DOC.brief_title: Free Amino Acid-based Formula to Treat Children Cow's Milk Protein Allergy
DOC.detailed_description: In the present study, the children will be followed-up during the treatment with the new formula for Cow`s Milk Allergy. They will have monthly doctor`s appointment, when the weight, height and symptoms will be evaluated, by a questionnaire and a physical examination.
DOC.criteria: Children with cow`s milk allergy Children without cow`s milk allergy
